i have no idea if this is a correct explanation; i just followed some type declarations and tried to explain what appears to be going on. please correct as necessary. i am not a crypto expert. i am not even a crypto newbie.

-rob

perhaps
  specifies the behavior of a block cipher.
or, if you want something more verbose
  specifies the behavior of a block cipher, which provides encryption of an individual block.
